mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_IMG, REVIEW_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, STAR_TASTE, STAR_AMOUNT, STAR_CLEAN, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"." MM"." DD"."') WRITE_DATE FROM "REVIEW" JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%${searchInput}%' ORDER BY READ_COUNT

SELECT REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_ADDRESS, REVIEW_IMG, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, STAR_TASTE, STAR_AMOUNT, STAR_CLEAN,ROUND((STAR_TASTE+STAR_AMOUNT+STAR_CLEAN)/3,1) STAR_TOTAL , REVIEW_MENU, REVIEW_ONELINE FROM "REVIEW" JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
